title: Teaching Methodology Practical Competency Enhancement: Data-Driven Online Mathematics Learning Course Improvement Project

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of elementary math concepts and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least two individual math learning vulnerabilities by analyzing online activity data.
Learners can revise learning strategies at least once based on data generated during PBL activities (e.g., problem-solving time, number of attempts).
Learners submit a comparative analysis report with peer learners based on formative assessment results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
